61:            def billing_address(params = {})
62:              
63:              if params.has_key?(:phone)
64:                phone = params.delete(:phone).to_s
65: 
66:                # Whipe all non digits
67:                phone.gsub!(/\D+/, '')
68: 
69:                # Parse in the us style (555 555 5555) which seems to be the only format paypal supports. Ignore anything before this. 
70:                if phone =~ /(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})$/
71:                  add_field(mappings[:billing_address][:phone_a], $1) 
72:                  add_field(mappings[:billing_address][:phone_b], $2) 
73:                  add_field(mappings[:billing_address][:phone_c], $3) 
74:                end
75:              end
76:              
77:              # Get the country code in the correct format
78:              # Use what we were given if we can't find anything
79:              country_code = lookup_country_code(params.delete(:country))
80:              add_field(mappings[:billing_address][:country], country_code)
81:              # Fix Canadian province if required
82:              if country_code == 'CA'
83:                province_code = params.delete(:state)
84:                add_field(mappings[:billing_address][:state], CANADIAN_PROVINCES[province_code.upcase]) unless province_code.nil?
85:              end
86:                
87:              # Everything else 
88:              params.each do |k, v|
89:                field = mappings[:billing_address][k]
90:                add_field(field, v) unless field.nil?
91:              end
92:            end
